Show memory allocation information for this platform. show [OPTIONS] -memoryresources
[OPTIONS] [-help|-h] : Display Help for the command [-verbose|-v] : Change the Debug Level Message Display [-ddrt] : Used to specify DDRT as the desired transport protocol [-smbus] : Used to specify SMBUS as the desired transport protocol [-units|-u(B|MB|MiB|GB|GiB|TB|TiB)] : Changes the output format. [-output|-o(text|nvmxml)] : Desired Unit for display
